org.apache.gearpump.streaming.source

Class DataSourceTask<IN,OUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.gearpump.streaming.task.Task
      • org.apache.gearpump.streaming.source.DataSourceTask<IN,OUT>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskInterface

    public class DataSourceTask<IN,OUT>
extends Task
    Default Task container for DataSource that reads from DataSource in batch See DataSourceProcessor for its usage

    DataSourceTask calls: - DataSource.open() in onStart and pass in TaskContext and application start time - DataSource.read() in each onNext, which reads a batch of messages - DataSource.close() in onStop

        Parameters:
        startTime - startTime that can be used to decide from when a source producer task should replay the data source, or from when a processor task should recover its checkpoint data in to in-memory state.
